main.name: Qusai Awwad
main.occupation: Supply Chain & Planning Analyst | Manufacturing | SAP ERP | Python
main.description: Certified Supply Chain Analyst (CSCA) with manufacturing experience in SAP production setup, Make-to-Order planning, inventory monitoring, and Python-based decision support.
main.bio: Certified Supply Chain Analyst (CSCA) with hands-on experience in manufacturing operations, production planning, and SAP ERP execution. Proven record in end-to-end SAP production system setup, BOM structuring, production reporting, and master data standardization. Skilled in Make-to-Order planning, inventory monitoring, and Python-driven analytics to improve planning accuracy, reduce waste, and support data-driven decisions.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to discuss supply chain planning, SAP-enabled manufacturing operations, and Python-based analytics.

work.title: Production & Supply Chain Engineer
work.description: Analyzed production and inventory data to support planning decisions. Executed SAP ERP transactions for production orders, material issuance, and inventory tracking. Improved planning accuracy through coordination with warehouse and management teams. Monitored raw materials and supported reorder planning to prevent shortages. Developed Make-to-Order plans to balance demand and inventory. Led SAP production system setup, standardized material coding, built BOMs with waste logic, customized reports, and coordinated system validation with the implementation partner.

work.title: Production Intern
work.description: Supported production line operations to ensure efficiency, continuous improvement, and compliance with safety standards. Calculated daily production requirements to maintain target output and stable line performance.

Certifications.descriptionofcertifications: Validated capability in supply chain planning, inventory control, logistics fundamentals, and performance improvement.
Strengthened project planning, execution, communication, and reporting skills to support effective cross-functional delivery.

Achievements.Achivedes: Won first place through strategic decision-making and measurable performance gains in The Fresh Connection simulation.

Achievements.Achive: • Global Finalist - Global Student Challenge (The Fresh Connection)
Achievements.Achivedes: Advanced to global finals by applying data-driven planning and risk-aware supply chain decisions.

Achievements.Achive: • 3rd Place - ISCEA Global Supply Chain Case Competition
Achievements.Achivedes: Delivered high-impact supply chain strategy recommendations focused on planning accuracy and risk mitigation.

skills.name: SAP ERP (Production Setup, BOM Structuring, Reporting)

projects.title: Stock Planner - Python
projects.description: Developed a Python-based production planning tool to analyze stock, material needs, and production quantities, supporting accurate Make-to-Order planning.

projects.title: Supply Chain Planning - Python
projects.description: Designed an end-to-end supply chain planning and inventory analysis system focused on improving demand visibility, planning accuracy, and material flow efficiency within manufacturing operations.

projects.title: Stock Market Data Analysis - Python
projects.description: Built a structured financial data analysis system using Python and multiple technical indicators to support analytical thinking and data-driven investment decision-making.

projects.title: Optimizing Project Management with Artificial Intelligence - Python & OpenAI
projects.description: Integrated AI-driven predictive modeling and automated reporting to enhance capital project monitoring, resource allocation efficiency, and progress tracking through data-driven optimization.
